basic.description:
A survey of selected topics concerning women's participation in international theatre. Emphasis will be on historical, practical and theoretical inquiry and application of feminist methodologies in such work.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36S;84P)
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Women and Theatre I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 3 and (registration in a DRAM Major or Medial Plan, or COCA-CODR Sub-Plan, or STSC Specialization Plan) and (a GPA of 2.6 in DRAM) or permission of the Department.
